doc:
Fern Fitzgerald https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fern_Fitzgerald 0 Fern Fitzgerald (born January 7, 1947 in Valley Stream, New York) is an American actress, best known for her recurring role as oil cartel businesswoman Marilee Stone in the CBS primetime soap opera Dallas from 1979 to 1989. She guest-starred in the number of other television series, like Archie Bunker's Place, Hill Street Blues, Hotel, Who's the Boss?, Life Goes On, and Seinfeld. In film, Fitzgerald appeared of The Beach Girls (1982). She also appeared in the original productions of Chicago and A Chorus Line on Broadway. Fern_Fitzgerald ( born January_7_,_1947 in Valley_Stream , New_York ) is an_American_actress , best_known for her_recurring_role as oil_cartel_businesswoman_Marilee_Stone in the_CBS_primetime_soap_opera Dallas from 1979 to 1989 . She guest-starred in the_number of other_television_series , like Archie_Bunker 's_Place , Hill_Street_Blues , Hotel , Who 's the_Boss ? , Life Goes On , and Seinfeld . In film , Fitzgerald appeared of The_Beach_Girls_(_1982_) . She also appeared in the_original_productions of Chicago and A_Chorus_Line on Broadway .
